title: Revolutionary

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role spawns in a Town Support slot instead of a town power.
- A different town power must spawn for this role to be present.
- The other town power is secretly aligned with the REF instead of town, and gains access to their factional chat
- If the other town power publicly guesses you as the Revolutionary before you take them down, they gain a powerful autovest and hang immunity the following day and you die, ending the day.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Propaganda:** check a player at night. You will learn if they’re a member of the town. The other town power registers as a member of the town to you

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value: - **Coup d’etat:** at night, select X players (X is the number of alive players/2 rounded down minus alive REF members including the other town power). If all are members of the town, you will stage a coup, and attack the other town power. If even one is not a member of the town, or is the other town power, you will be revealed as the Revolutionary to the other town power. If the Coup is successful, you will be revealed as the Revolutionary, gain basic defense, and your votes will count as 3.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully stage a coup and hang all remaining players seeking to destroy the town. (Town goal)
